meta.content: Concord Community Schools value each student individually – offering quality instruction and challenging programs at all levels throughout the district.
Concord Community Schools value each student individually – offering quality instruction and challenging programs at all levels throughout the district.

a.span: Free student meals are available for pick-up at @c

img.alt: Free student meals are available for pick-up at @chssocial (main entrance) and @cjhsocial (see map) from 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Tuesdays.⠀ ⠀ For those picking up meals at Concord Junior High School, please enter off C.R. 24 and drive around the back side of the building to Door 16 to pick up meals. You will then exit onto C.R. 11. ⠀ *****⠀⠀ Los puntos de entrega de las comidas gratuitas para los estudiantes serán en Concord High School (entrada principal) y Concord Junior High School (ver mapa) los martes de 11:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m.⠀ ⠀ Para aquellos que recogerán la comida en Concord Junior High School, por favor entre por C.R. 24 y diríjase a la parte trasera del edificio hasta la Puerta 16 para recoger las comidas. La salida será por el C.R. 11.

Free student meals are available for pick-up at @chssocial (main entrance) and @cjhsocial (see map) from 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. Tuesdays.⠀ ⠀ For those picking up meals at Concord Junior High School, please enter off C.R. 24 and drive around the back side of the building to Door 16 to pick up meals. You will then exit onto C.R. 11. ⠀ *****⠀⠀ Los puntos de entrega de las comidas gratuitas para los estudiantes serán en Concord High School (entrada principal) y Concord Junior High School (ver mapa) los martes de 11:00 a.m. a 1:00 p.m.⠀ ⠀ Para aquellos que recogerán la comida en Concord Junior High School, por favor entre por C.R. 24 y diríjase a la parte trasera del edificio hasta la Puerta 16 para recoger las comidas. La salida será por el C.R. 11.

a.span: The Concord School Board has selected Dan Funston

img.alt: The Concord School Board has selected Dan Funston to serve as the district’s next superintendent. Please join us in welcoming Mr. Funston! Read more online at https://www.concord.k12.in.us/dan-funston-named-superintendent/ #ConcordPride ⠀ ****⠀ La Junta Escolar de Concord ha elegido a Dan Funston para servir como el próximo superintendente del distrito. ¡Por favor acompáñenos a darle la bienvenida a Mr.Funston! Encuentre más información en https://www.concord.k12.in.us/dan-funston-named-superintendent/ #OrgulloConcord

The Concord School Board has selected Dan Funston to serve as the district’s next superintendent. Please join us in welcoming Mr. Funston! div.div:
** PLEASE NOTE: All Concord Community Schools events and activities are canceled until at least May 1 in accordance with Gov. Eric Holcomb’s executive order. Calendars will be updated as more information becomes available. **
April 6-9 — Spring Break
May 25 — Memorial Day (Schools closed)
May 29 — Last Day of School
June 8 — Class of 2020 Commencement
June 8-26 — Concord High School Summer School
July 8 — Beginning Band begins
July 13 — Beginning Orchestra begins
July 13-17 — Freshman Marching Band
July 20-24 — Marching Band Camp
July 27-30 and Aug. 3-6 — Concord Junior High Summer School and Camp Concord
July 27-Aug. 10 — Evening Marching Band Camp
Aug. 3-6 — Kindergarten Jumpstart

div.h4: Follow Concord Community Schools on social media

p.em: Concord Community Schools develops students who are highly literate, able to demonstrate mastery of state and national standards, and who are college- and career-ready.
